word: JUST A WORD FURTHER ABOUT HER SICKNESS.  IT HAS BEEN HER LOT, AS BROTHER LOUGHBOROUGH REMARKED, TO SUFFER MORE THAN THE ORDINARY CHRISTIAN.  GOD PERMITTED IT, AND SHE--I THINK I WILL LET HER SPEAK FOR HERSELF AS TO HOW SHE REGARDED IT.  I HAVE A STATEMENT HERE FROM HER OWN WRITINGS THAT I WILL READ:
